raw_mentions:
If acting on p38 MAP kinase directly, in one embodiment the inhibitor should exhibit an IC50 value of about 5 μM or less, preferably 500 nm or less, more preferably 100 nm or less.
In a related embodiment, the inhibitor should exhibit an IC50 value relative to the p38α MAP kinase isoform that is about ten fold less than that observed when the same inhibitor is tested against other p38 MAP kinase isoforms in a comparable assay.

final_json.value: less than that observed when the same inhibitor is tested against other p38 MAP kinase isoforms
